alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 18 at 3:59AM CDT until October 18 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Cook County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect strong crosswinds along Minnesota Highway 61 from Grand Portage to Taconite Harbor.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
